references.paper_title: FixMatch: Simplifying semi-supervised learning with consistency and confidence
references.reason: This paper introduces FixMatch, a highly influential semi-supervised learning method that the current paper adapts for regression tasks.

references.paper_title: MixMatch: A holistic approach to semi-supervised learning
references.reason: MixMatch is another important semi-supervised learning method that serves as a foundation for the current paper's approach.

references.paper_title: Learning to rank using gradient descent
references.reason: This paper introduces RankNet, a fundamental ranking algorithm that inspires the auxiliary ranking classifier component in the current work.

references.paper_title: Mean teachers are better role models: Weight-averaged consistency targets improve semi-supervised deep learning results
references.reason: This paper introduces the Mean Teacher model, a consistency regularization method that is relevant to the current paper's approach.
This paper introduces Temporal Ensembling, another consistency regularization method that is related to the methods used in the current paper.
